title: The Cigar Authority 10th Anniversary Show
itunes:title: The Cigar Authority 10th Anniversary Show
description:
LIVE from the Toscano Cigar Sound Stage in Salem, New Hampshire…  It’s The Cigar Authority 10th Anniversary. This week we take a victory lap and look back at 10 Years of memories. In the first hour we look back at the early years, as we light up an Intemperance Whiskey Rebellion from The Care Package.

In the second hour we look at some stats as we light up a cigar from Dave’s personal stash. It’s a cigar that he mentioned a few weeks ago, Partagas 150 Don Ramon.  We will have this and all the usual suspects including Versus, Offer of the Day, Cigar News and a peek into the Asylum. The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at http://www.2GuysCigars.com/.

Never miss an episode by subscribing to the show via Apple Podcasts and Podbean.
